response.original_title: Phil Hellmuth's Million Dollar Online Poker Secrets
response.overview: Why wait until you can afford the trip to Vegas to clean up playing poker? Let poker champion Phil Hellmuth show you the tricks of the trade when it comes to hitting the jackpot online! You'll be taught what sites to play; online tells; how to bluff;how to win tournaments; and much more. Comes packaged with bonus software disc. 60 min. Standard; Soundtrack: English Dolby Digital stereo; bonus footage; trailers.
response.title: Phil Hellmuth's Million Dollar Online Poker Secrets
